Comments: Some of the side effects reported here are fairly predictable and others I question the causal relationship.  The drug typically doesn't last more than several months to six months at the most.  Fat atrophy is very common when the injection is given in the subcutaneous area. This is a big problem for women who carry more fat there than men and therefore women can have more problems with this side effect.  The other thing to consider is diluting the medication with marcaine or other injectable anesthetics - at a lower concentration you may be at less risk for fat atrophy.  For me_ the medication has been a miracle drug.  I have had a number of trigger points injected and it has cured me of terrible pain.
